  • Constructor Details

    • Oval

      public Oval​(Posn p, Dimension d, Color c)
      To create an Oval given a Posn, Dimension, and Color. Posn assumes center of the shape. Dimension assumes width and height. Color represents color.
      Parameters:
      p - the position of the center of the circle the board
      d - the dimension of the oval
      c - the color of the oval
